product_overview: A comprehensive hotel reservation platform enabling users to search and book hotel rooms, manage their bookings, and access a personalized dashboard, complete with secure authentication and administrative capabilities.
core_goals: Enable users to securely register and log in via email/password or OAuth.
Provide a seamless hotel and room browsing experience with advanced search and filtering.
Allow users to book rooms with real-time availability and dynamic pricing.
Offer user-friendly management of bookings with detailed views and cancellation options.
Present a personalized dashboard displaying booking statistics and trends.
Ensure responsive design and accessibility across devices.
Maintain robust protected routes enforcing authentication and session management.
key_features: Complete authentication system with email/password login, registration, OAuth integration, JWT-based secured routes, and session persistence.
Modern landing page with hero section, feature highlights, and call-to-action components.
Hotel browsing with search, filters, detailed views including amenities and ratings.
Rooms browsing with filters for dates, guests, room types, and detailed room information.

Advanced booking workflow featuring real-time availability checks, dynamic pricing including weekend and holiday rates, guest information collection, and booking confirmation with unique reference generation.
User booking management with status tracking (upcoming, current, past, cancelled), cancellation options, and real-time updates.
Personal user dashboard showing booking stats, recent bookings, trend visualizations, and quick navigation actions.
Admin dashboard for hotel and system management.
Responsive main layout with theme switching, notifications, and user navigation.
State management via Zustand to handle authentication, UI state, and domain data efficiently.
Integration with Supabase and backend API for data real-time updates and persistence.
user_flow_summary: User registers or logs in securely via email/password or Google OAuth, then is granted access to authenticated areas.
User browses hotels by name or location using search and filter tools, views hotel details, and selects rooms for booking.
User searches for available rooms by date, guest count, and room type, viewing dynamic pricing and availability updated in real-time.
User completes booking by entering guest details, reviewing price breakdown, and receiving a unique booking confirmation and reference.
User manages existing bookings, viewing details, filtering by status, and cancelling eligible reservations with confirmation feedback.
User accesses the personalized dashboard to see booking statistics, recent activity, and trends visualized in charts, and uses quick actions to navigate.
Admin users access the admin dashboard for system management.
Users experience responsive design and theme changes for optimal usability across devices.
validation_criteria: Authentication flows enforce secure validation, display appropriate error/success messages, and maintain session persistence including logout functionality.
Hotel and room search return accurate filtered results with real-time availability and loading states.
Booking process validates guest information, applies dynamic pricing correctly, and provides unique booking references with confirmation display and email (if applicable).
Booking management UI displays updated booking statuses and supports cancellation with business rules and feedback dialogs.
Dashboard displays accurate statistics and trends based on user data with robust responsive chart rendering.
Protected routes restrict unauthenticated access and redirect appropriately.
All interactive elements and forms validate input consistently and handle errors gracefully.
Application UI is responsive and theme switching applies consistently across all components.
